front.title: SDWAN WAN Ports Property Advertisement in BGP UPDATE

abstract.t: The document describes how the SDWAN SAFI, which is assigned by IANA in the First Come First Server range, is used for SDWAN edge nodes to propagate its WAN port properties to its controller. In the context of this document, BGP Route Reflectors (RR) is the component of the SDWAN Controller that receives the BGP UPDATE from SDWAN edges and in turns propagate the information to a group of authorized SDWAN edges reachable via overlay networks.
